summary:
This mods adds a chest filled with ingots (and leather) to Riverwood!
(Right under the tree on the small "island")
descriptionHtml:
Note:
I just messed around with the CS , creating this mod for a friend, and uploaded this mod here for fun, expecting not more than a couple of downloads, but sure as hell, not this many...

~Thank You!~

[u]What this mod does:[/u]
This mods adds a chest filled with 1000 ingots of each type to Riverwood.

[u]What is to come?[/u]
I plan on adding the resources you suggest, so keep 'em coming! ;)
[s]Next up will be daedra hearts.[/s]

[u]Where to find it:[/u]
To find the chest, go to the small "island" left to Riverwoods standard entrance, and look below the tree!
Or look at the screenshot, that should help you to find the chest for sure!

[u]Version History:[/u]
2.0 - Release on the Nexus (1.0 was released on the steam workshop only)

3.0 - Added daedra hearts + black soul gems

4.0 - Added dragon scales and bones
[line]
This is my first mod, feedback & ideas are really welcome!
I'm giving my best and hope you understand my English, if not: just ask!

Have Fun & Enjoy!
author: GermanShark

files.name: Ingot Chest
